name: Cow Snatcher
description:
Small game about snatching cows from farmers. Mothership tasked you with a challenge of snatching as many cows as you can in five minutes from some strange ranch. These type of assault missions assign only to brave or stupid. What type are you, in the end, only be determinated by your skill.

Controls:

  • Left Mouse Click

First in a pack of 12 small games of 2023. Made in January.
